body: Just asking and If so how much? I would love to have an admin/owner answer

title: Do you support competitive minecraft?

replies.body: I DO 100 PERCENT IM WAITING TO FLY TO A ESPORTS MINECRAFT EVENT AND GET TEAM ROCKET THERE LESSS GO BOYSSSSSSSSSS
replies.body_tagged: I DO 100 PERCENT IM WAITING TO FLY TO A ESPORTS MINECRAFT EVENT AND GET TEAM ROCKET THERE LESSS GO BOYSSSSSSSSSS

replies.body: Refereeing is fun and it's the only thing I do in competitive mineman
replies.body_tagged: Refereeing is fun and it's the only thing I do in competitive mineman

replies.body:
I think that If the teams dont have the same pc / connection it wont be equilibrated , This game its bassed in ms.

The solution looks easy: Concentrate the teams in a place and play in there with the same conditions (like lol players).
But , can a server like avicus stratus or badlion do it? Move players from every part of the world to the same place?
Theres no any server who can do it , and for it maybe the server need a eSports sponsor , but must to be a powerfull sponsor , lets see if any server can get one

Edit: just my opinon

replies.body: Who is actually gonna fly to a "competitive minecraft" event in a different country as if it was like an csgo/ LoL tournament???
replies.body_tagged: Who is actually gonna fly to a "competitive minecraft" event in a different country as if it was like an csgo/ LoL tournament???

replies.body: eh, every game can go competitive as long as there are sweaty tryhards playing it (minecraft has no shortage of them) so why not? let them have their fun being other lego people (: It'll be interesting to see Badlion's tournaments at least
